short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display Microsoft Safe Links as the original URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click on this extension's icon to decode and display Microsoft Safe Links as their original URLs, making the links easier to read without sacrificing the security benefits provided by Safe Links.

Specifically, this extension only affects the appearance of Safe Links (by replacing the "innerText" property of <a> tags). It does not alter the actual addresses that Safe Links redirect to (i.e., the "href" attribute remains unchanged).

To ensure the safety and privacy of users, the source code for this extension can be reviewed at https://github.com/francisyyan/safelinks-decoder.
